content: the yarn shop at alma park hindsight shawl nj wool walk 2020 by rose mogerman indy dyer at alma park www yourlysonline com nj wool walk 2020 is set for april 2-5 and i wanted to create something to showcase the 2020 wool walk colorway which is also named hindsight this squishy garter stitch asymmetrical boomerang type shawl is knit without a single purl stitch squishy large and stylish this shawl can be knit by a beginner but is also interesting enough for an experienced knitter ©2020 rose mogerman all rights reserved please do not copy or reproduce this pattern in anyway electronically or otherwise 1 yarn 3 skeins of squish dk from alma park 274 yds | 100 gr in 3 different colors 1 variegated or speckled 2 semi-solids / tonals either complimentary or contrast color 2 should be the variegated or speckled although it is really up to you colors used sample 1 color 1 kale color 2 london blue topaz color 3 raspberry colors used sample 2 color 1 concord grape color 2 hindsight 2020 wool walk colorway color 3 lannister substitutions any dk weight yarn needles us 8 6mm 40 circular needles notions 1 split stitch marker to mark right side of work optional tapestry needle scissors gauge 16 sts and 20 row in 4 in garter st gauge is not critical as this is a shawl but a different gauge may use more or less yarn and finished measurements will be different finished measurements wingspan 76 and depth at deepest point 19 abbreviations k knit st sts - stitch stitches k2tog knit 2 sts together yo yarn over kfb knit in front and back of st 1 st increase ws wrong side rs right side wyif with yarn in front sl slip_stitch purl-wise wyif ©2020 rose mogerman all rights reserved please do not copy or reproduce this pattern in anyway electronically or otherwise 2 garter pattern 1 stitch increased per repeat - 2 row 1 rs sl1 k until 2 sts remain kfb k1 2 ws sl1 kfb k until 2 sts remain k2tog lace pattern 3 stitches increased per repeat - 6 row 1 rs sl1 k1 yo k2tog repeat until 2 sts remain yo k2 2 ws sl1 kfb k until 2 sts remain k2tog 3 rs sl1 k1 yo k2tog repeat until 3 sts remain yo k3 4 ws sl1 kfb k until 2 sts remain k2tog 5 rs sl1 k1 yo k2tog repeat until 2 sts remain yo k2 6 ws sl1 kfb k until 2 sts remain k2tog i broke it into sections so that it was easier to follow and included counts if you are off on your counts it will not make a big difference so don t panic if you are starting a lace session you ll want to start off with an even number or you ll need to fudge the numbers at the end directions with color 1 cast on 3 sts using german long
